events.name: Leicester City at Brighton & Hove Albion

headlines.description: Jamie Vardy's late penalty rescued a point for a Leicester City side who overcame the dismissal of James Maddison to draw 1-1 at Brighton.
headlines.shortLinkText: Vardy's late goal rescues point for 10-man Leicester

headlines.description: Everton climbed to sixth with a hard-fought 1-0 win over Cardiff.
headlines.shortLinkText: Sigurdsson gives Everton 1-0 win over Cardiff

headlines.description: Fulham moved off the foot of the Premier League table with a much-needed win against relegation rivals Southampton.
headlines.shortLinkText: Ranieri gets dream start with Fulham win

headlines.description: A tepid Manchester United dented their hopes of catching up with the Premier League's top four with a dour 0-0 home draw with Crystal Palace.
headlines.shortLinkText: Toothless United held to home draw by Palace

headlines.description: Liverpool maintained pressure on table-topping Manchester City with three second-half goals sealing a comfortable 3-0 victory at Watford.
headlines.shortLinkText: Liverpool win at Watford to keep on City's tail

events.name: Manchester City at West Ham United

headlines.description: Manchester City maintained their unbeaten league start to the season, while West Ham's defensive woes went on.
headlines.shortLinkText: Man City stay top after 4-0 win at West Ham

headlines.description: Goals from Dele Alli, Harry Kane and Heung-min Son put Tottenham three up before Olivier Giroud grabbed a late consolation for Chelsea.
headlines.shortLinkText: Spurs end Chelsea's unbeaten start with 3-1 win
